category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Tc_preserve_replica_pfmember_ownership
preference.preference_description: Determines whether part family members created at a site, which are based on a replica part family template, is owned by the master site or the local site. This preference is applicable when creating part family members from Teamcenter Integration for NX. Valid Values: TRUE - Part family members are created with the same site ownership as that of their template. FALSE - Part family members are created with the local site ownership.
